title: Main export partners of Germany 2017
summary: The statistic shows the take-up of video on demand on the TV in selected countries as of October 2015 . In the united states , 38 percent of respondents stated they used video-on-demand services . By contrast , only 9 percent of respondents in spain stated that they use similar services .
gold: This statistic shows the main export partners of Germany as of 2017 . That year , Germany 's main export partner were the United States with a 8.8 percent share in Germany 's total exports .
